de.ityx.contex.featuremapping

Interface FeaturePointMapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FeaturePointMapperService

    public interface FeaturePointMapper

    • Method Detail

      • createFeatures

        Collection<FeatureWord> createFeatures(CPage cpage)

      • generateFeaturePairs

        Collection<FeaturePair> generateFeaturePairs(Collection<FeatureWord> referenceWords,
                                           Collection<FeatureWord> instanceWords)

      • findPoint

        Point findPoint(Point pointInReference,
              Collection<FeaturePair> featurePairs)
        Find the corresponding point in the instance document based on the provided FeaturePairs.
        FeaturePairs should be already filtered to achieve better results.
        Parameters:
        pointInReference - - Point in reference document
        featurePairs - - the FeaturePairs of reference and instance document
        Returns:
        the corresponding point in instance document or null if no point can be found

      • mapPoint

        Point mapPoint(Point pointOfReference,
             Collection<FeatureWord> referenceWords,
             Collection<FeatureWord> instanceWords)

      • mapPoint

        Point mapPoint(Point pointOfReference,
             Collection<FeatureWord> referenceWords,
             CPage instance)

      • mapPoint

        Point mapPoint(Point pointInReference,
             CPage reference,
             CPage instance)
        Find the corresponding point for a given point in reference document in an instance document.
        This method is a convenience method and has poor performance for subsequent calls for the same documents.
        Parameters:
        pointInReference - - Point in reference document
        reference - - the reference document/page
        instance - - the instance document/page
        Returns:
        the corresponding point in instance document or null if no point can be found

      • calculateTransformation

        AffineTransform calculateTransformation(Point pointInReference,
                                      Collection<FeaturePair> featurePairs)
